summary: Inspired by the Respectful Lydia mod. I wanted the same for Marcurio, couldn\'t find it, so I made one.
descriptionHtml:
Marcurio is pretty adamant about not wanting to carry your stuff. I found this amusing until I married him and he still acted like a jerk any time I wanted to hand him some new armor. So, inspired by the very popular Respectful Lydia - Willing Burden Carrier (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4806/?) which I also use, I poked around the creation kit to make a similar one for Marcurio.

I don\'t have any detailed options like the Lydia one, just a simple replacement to \"What would you like me to carry?\"

Please feel free to modify as suits you and redistribute with your changes. But do let me know! I\'d love to see what you do with it.

Please tell me if you find a bug! It works perfectly for all 4 of my saved games, but if something weird happens for you, send me a note.


P.S. If anyone knows how to flag it so his dialogue will only change AFTER you\'ve married him, please send me a message. That was my original intent but I couldn\'t figure it out. :)
author: Geshtinanna
